h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone
content: While he technically has a boss health bar and everything, The Man-in-Stone "boss" kind of a pushover, barely having much more health than a regular Pitstone, and only doing their regular attacks anyway. Simply Immobilize him, rack up some Focus Points, and deliver a charged strike to send him packing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Man-in-Stone' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone'.
The content is as follows:
While he technically has a boss health bar and everything, The Man-in-Stone "boss" kind of a pushover, barely having much more health than a regular Pitstone, and only doing their regular attacks anyway. Simply Immobilize him, rack up some Focus Points, and deliver a charged strike to send him packing.
